8.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'd ibn Ubadah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: No man recites the Qur'an, then forgets it, but will meet Allah on the Day of Judgment in a maimed condition (or empty-handed, or with no excuse)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِيمَنْ حَفِظَ الْقُرْآنَ ثُمَّ نَسِيَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Severe Reprimand For Whoever Memorized The Qur'an And Then Forgot It
